statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(basename "$(pwd)"); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "?"'); cost=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cost.total_cost_usd // 0'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); project="${DOCS_PATH##*/}"; if [ -z "$project" ]; then project="VIBING"; fi; if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); total=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / total)); printf '\033[01;34m%s\033[00m | \033[01;33m%s\033[00m | \033[01;36m%d%%\033[00m | \033[01;32m$%.2f\033[00m | \033[01;35m%s\033[00m' "$dir" "$model" "$pct" "$cost" "$project"; else printf '\033[01;34m%s\033[00m | \033[01;33m%s\033[00m | \033[01;36m0%%\033[00m | \033[01;32m$0.00\033[00m | \033[01;35m%s\033[00m' "$dir" "$model" "$project"; fi
